src:
Karla masaya ang lovelife
06 Nov 2019, 10:47 by Aster Amoyo
MASAYA umano ang estado ng  puso ngayon ng Queen Mother ni Daniel Padilla  na si Karla Estrada dahil sa napapabalitang boyfriend nito ngayon na nagngangalang Jam.  Nagkakilala umano ang dalawa isa isang kilalang restobar.
Panahon na rin siguro na bigyan naman ng oras ni Karla ang kanyang buhay-pag-ibig lalupa’t malalaki na lahat ang kanyang apat na anak.
Si Daniel na siyang panganay sa kanilang apat na magkakapatid ay masaya para sa kanyang ina na sobrang nagsakripisyo as a single parent para lamang maitaguyod silang  magkakapatid.
Ang bagong boyfriend ngayon ni Karla ay madalas umanong kasa-kasama ng singer-actress-TV host and entrepreneur maging sa kanilang recent vacation ng dalawa sa Palawan.
Karla will be celebrating her 45th birthday on November 21.
text:
Karla is fun for the lovelife
06 Nov 2019, 10:47 by Aster Amoyo
THE heart of Daniel Padilla's Queen Mother, Karla Estrada, is said to have been heartbroken over her now estranged boyfriend named Jam. The two are known to be a well-known restobar.
Maybe it's time for Karla to give her life-love, especially when all four of her children are grown.
Daniel, the eldest of their four siblings, is happy for his mother who sacrificed so much as a single parent just to raise her siblings.
Karla's new boyfriend is now expected to be with the singer-actress-TV host and entrepreneur even on their recent vacation in Palawan.
Karla will be celebrating her 45th birthday on November 21.
